column4: Hi all, I can't get my screen to show above 640x480 on a fresh 9.10 install. I'd be satisfied with 1024 even. Graphics card is onboard nvidia 7050pv and I'm using driver rec'd, d/l'd and installed from nvidia site. Help?
did you tried with the ones on the repos. Activating them from the Restricted Harware Drivers Panel?
gloom: I went with nvid .sh because before that I couldn't get a gui. Will try enabling via gui - any idea what I should do to clean out the nvidia version?
AFAIK activating the restricted controller into the gui will suffice. It will leave always some crappy file from the sh, but nothing harmful
